video.title: Voltron Force
video.synopsis: Join Keith, Lance, Princess Allura, Pidge, Hunk and their new cadets as they struggle to keep the universe safe from King Lotor and his Robeasts.

episodes.synopsis: Two Galaxy Alliance Academy cadets, Daniel and Vince, are recruited into a secret resistance movement led by the original Voltron Force.
episodes.title: The Trilogy, Part 1: New School Defenders

episodes.synopsis: Daniel and Vince meet fellow cadet Larmina. After the cadets are given their Voltcoms, they help the Voltron Force retrieve their Robot Lions.
episodes.title: The Trilogy, Part 2: Defenders of Arus

episodes.synopsis: Reunited, Voltron Force must combine to form Voltron. Is the team ready to take on King Lotor's Robeast and Sky Marshal Wade's war machine?
episodes.title: The Trilogy, Part 3: Defenders of The Universe

episodes.synopsis: Voltron Force must rescue their old friend, Coran, who is being held captive inside Sky Marshal Wade's trap-laden moon base.
episodes.title: Coran, Coran

episodes.synopsis: The cadets are captured while taking the Robot Lions on a joyride to Planet Doom, giving a newly powered King Lotor a chance to attack Arus.
episodes.title: Joyride to Doom

episodes.synopsis: Yellow Lion pilot Hunk takes the cadets on a bonding mission to his secret junkyard, where they are attacked by Haggarium-infected robots.
episodes.title: The Hunkyard

episodes.synopsis: After receiving a distress call, the Voltron Force journeys to the planet Ariel to defend a race of lion-riding warriors from Sky Marshal Wade.
episodes.title: Lion Riders Return

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious hypersonic Robeast challenges the Voltron Force to upgrade their formation sequence.
episodes.title: Flash Forms a Go!

episodes.synopsis: As new cadet Vince seeks to prove his worth, he finds himself trapped on a sinking ship filled with Haggarium on a planet with a bottomless ocean.
episodes.title: Dark Blue

episodes.synopsis: When Daniel makes a surprise appearance on Cmdr. Keith's secret mission, Keith must attempt a prison break from an invisible-cloaked vessel.
episodes.title: Wanted and Unwanted

episodes.synopsis: The Voltron Force faces its toughest challenge to date and takes on Lotor's five predator enemies that can combine to form one super predator Robeast.
episodes.title: Predator Robeast

episodes.synopsis: Blue Lion pilot Princess Allura is caught in Sky Marshal Wade's blockade of the Planet Ebb and forced to fight in a combat arena.
episodes.title: Hungry for Voltron

episodes.synopsis: The Voltron Force travels to Earth to finish the fight with Wade but are hijacked by his secret weapon, which allows him to take control of Voltron.
episodes.title: Clash of the Lions

episodes.synopsis: After Wade's defeat, cadet Larmina is tasked with organizing a universe victory concert, unaware that Lotor's spies have infiltrated the celebration.
episodes.title: Inside the Music

episodes.synopsis: The new cadets go for a pizza run on Earth and encounter a Voltron-obsessed fan with sinister intentions.
episodes.title: Rogue Trip

episodes.synopsis: Green Lion pilot Pidge's home planet of Balto has been taken over by Lotor, who is turning its inhabitants into mindless ninja-zombies.
episodes.title: Brains

episodes.synopsis: In an effort to save his son, former Voltron Force member Sven returns and hijacks the Blue Lion, only to be double-crossed by Lotor.
episodes.title: Ghost in the Lion

episodes.synopsis: Lotor's brilliant but twisted scientist, Maahox, infiltrates the Voltron Force through a bizarre holographic pet.
episodes.title: Gary

episodes.synopsis: The Voltron Force returns to Planet Ariel and must survive challenges inside dangerous mines that hold clues to the secret of Voltron's origin.
episodes.title: Five Forged

episodes.synopsis: The Voltron Force heads to the leisure planet of Dradin but soon discovers ex-members of Lotor's army attempting to take over the planet by force.
episodes.title: Dradin, Baby, Dradin

episodes.synopsis: When Daniel's consciousness is accidentally transferred into Voltron's robotic body, he becomes the living embodiment of the Defender of the Universe.
episodes.title: I, Voltron

episodes.synopsis: Voltron Force receives a distress call from the past that leads them to a haunted spaceship graveyard where Lotor also awaits.
episodes.title: Crossed Signals

episodes.synopsis: While battling the roots of a plant-like Robeast, Allura must choose between becoming Queen of Arus or continuing her role as Blue Lion pilot.
episodes.title: Roots of Evil

episodes.synopsis: King Lotor is replicated into a powerful army of clones that attempts to take over Planet Arus and permanently destroy Voltron.
episodes.title: The Army of One

episodes.synopsis: Voltron Force takes on a fully powered King Lotor, all while fighting a rogue spider Robeast that is able to merge itself with its foe.
episodes.title: Deceive and Conquer

episodes.synopsis: It's the final battle for the Voltron Force as Castle Doom is transformed into the largest Robeast ever, attempting to destroy the Galaxy Alliance.
episodes.title: Black
